definitions.text: earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
examples: made an effort to cover all the reading material
wished him luck in his endeavor
she gave it a good try

definitions.text: use of physical or mental energy; hard work
examples: he got an A for effort
they managed only with great exertion
the book was her finest effort

definitions.text: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end
examples: they worked in the cause of world peace
the team was ready for a drive toward the pennant
